summary: A slacker (Akshay Kumar) must impress a wealthy man to marry her daughter (Juhi Chawla).
cast: Akshay Kumar|Juhi Chawla|Paresh Rawal|Anil Dhawan|Himani Shivpuri|Upasna Singh|Prachi|Johnny Lever|Satish Kaushik|Gulshan Grover|Kader Khan|Rakesh Bedi|Mac Mohan|Jack Gaud|Shashi Kiran|Birbal|Gurbachan Singh|Jugnu|Babbanlal Yadav|Sunil Dhawan|Kishore Anand Bhanushali|Raj Kishore|Emmanuel Yarborough|Guddi Maruti|Mohit Rajhans|Anjala Zaveri
title: Mr. & Mrs. Khiladi
